attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britons have spent hundreds of years fighting for the liberal State we are now lucky enough to have.  We can only have ONE law for all. For the Rowan Williams to suggest different laws for different people is a travesty. All citizens first loyalty has got be to the state before their religion, otherwise we get confused people doing things like 7/7.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
